description: With a leather-constructed upper for durability and comfort, the TX4 is designed for long approaches on rugged terrain. The "Climbing Zone” toe, featuring Vibram® Mega-Grip™ Traverse rubber, coupled with the burly Trail Bite™ Heel Platform provides maximum grip in scree and mud.
name: La Sportiva TX4 - Mens

specs.value: OrthoLite Hybrid with 5% recycled rubber + 15% production waste foam
